parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes specified music track event handler.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[removeMusicEventHandler]] [type, id]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [type, id]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - "MusicStart" or "MusicStop"

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> id: [[Number]] - event handler id

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStart", 12];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[removeMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStop", 12];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>hnd_stop = [[addMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStop",{}];
[[removeMusicEventHandler]] ["MusicStop",hnd_stop];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMusicEventHandler]], [[setMusicEventHandler]], [[removeAllMusicEventHandlers]], [[playMusic]]
</value></part></template>
